featured.text: And you’re a bioethicist and one of the architects of Obamacare.

definition.zh_def: 美國的一項健康保險改革法案，旨在擴大醫療保險覆蓋範圍，降低醫療費用。
definition.en_def: A U.S. health insurance reform law aimed at expanding healthcare coverage and reducing healthcare costs.
definition.example: Many people benefited from Obamacare by gaining access to affordable health insurance.
